 2008-12712008-06-19EC,  HEALTH,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisPOLYBROMINATED DIPHENYL ETHERS REGULATIONS which will prohibit the manufacture of PBDEs and the use, sale, offer for sale and import of tetraBDE, pentaBDE, hexaBDE, as well as mixtures, polymers and resins containing these substances.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2008-0218 Publication Date: 2008-07-09
